Posts.Content: Hi.  I found out this week I have breast cancer.  I'm going to start chemo and want to be prepared with the appropriate headwear.  Does anyone have any tips on what I'll need from 'day one'?  Thanks so much.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - need headwear advice please

Posts.Content: Leolady56.  Thank you so much for your advice.  I'm going to try everything!  I'll let you know how I get on.  Enjoy what's left of your weekend.  And, thanks again :-)
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - need headwear advice please
